dict.acceptation: 精确地；恰好地；严谨地，严格地；一丝不苟地；

sent.orig: So you think we ought to wait here?—Precisely.
sent.trans: 那么你认为我们应该在这儿等吗？——对。

sent.orig: Precisely. That's just what I had tried to talk her round.
sent.trans: 就是嘛，我也这么劝过她。

sent.orig: Expertly and precisely crafted from the highest quality stainless steel for a lifetime of use.
sent.trans: 对仗和精工正是从最高品质不？袗？终生使用。

sent.orig: The curve fitting method can precisely extract the 4 parameters of sine wave.
sent.trans: 曲线拟合法能够精确地提取正弦信号的四个参数。

sent.orig: Above these characteristics are precisely the performance which the real estate market declines.
sent.trans: 以上这些特征正是房地产市场衰退的表现。
